snippet.title: The Eliminator for the Apple II
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

Atari 8-bit
TRS-80 

Game description:

A home computer version of the Williams Electronics' coin-op game Defender. Your goal is to pilot your fast moving spaceship over the ground and destroy waves of alien marauders. Additionally in the TRS-80 version you must prevent the alien hoards from recovering your energizers from the surface.

What I think:

Well, it would be unfair to say something, as I had problems with the controls on here. Keyboard controls were only left, right and shoot and while the paddle controls were somewhat better, they were still bad, as it was hard to maneuver your ship.
